comment: TODO(b/206557124): Add more animation customization options.

variables.name: DEFAULT
variables.comment: The default {@link TaskFragmentAnimationParams} to use when there is no app override.

variables.name: DEFAULT_ANIMATION_BACKGROUND_COLOR
variables.comment:
* The default value for animation background color, which means to use the theme window
     * background color.

methods.name: public int getAnimationBackgroundColor()
methods.comment:
* The {@link ColorInt} to use for the background during the animation with this TaskFragment if
     * the animation requires a background.
     *
     * The default value is {@code 0}, which is to use the theme window background.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
